summary: Adds Toads and Frogs - Companions - Armies - Wild - Mounts
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ff0000][size=6]Toads and Frogs of Skyrim[/size][/color][/b] [color=#00ff00]version 3.2[/color] No DLC required

Adds Toads and Frogs in the world of Skyrim : Companions + Armies + Wild + Mounts

[i]The "wild" and the "armies" (incubated eggs) have a realistic size. The followers/companions (and the mounts), not![/i]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/DIhRwKm.gif[/img]



[b][color=#ff0000][size=4]WILD and COMPANIONS[/size][/color][/b]

25 Toads or Frogs Companions (you can talk: Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss) + 313 Wild Toads and 189 Wild Frogs with Sounds of ambience are located [u]near the Deadwood Lumber Mill[/u] of [color=#00ff00]Falkreath [/color] (It lies just north of Dengeir's House along the river) + near [color=#00ff00] Riverwood [/color]+ near [color=#00ff00]Whiterun[/color] + near the Western Watchtower of Whiterun (near the Small House of my mod[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78954/?] The World Tree of Skyrim[/url]) + around the [color=#00ff00]Lake LLinalta [/color](near Riverwood) + around the [color=#00ff00]Lake Geir [/color](near Ivarstead) + around the [color=#00ff00]Lake Honrich [/color](near Riften), also near [color=#00ff00]Markath[/color] (the river of the Markath stables), near and in [color=#00ff00]Morthal[/color] and the [color=#00ff00]South of Solitude [/color](near the boats on the other shore)



[b][color=#ff0000][size=4]ARMIES[/size][/color][/b]

This mod adds the ability to quickly incubate eggs of Toads/Frogs with the fire of the forge, and quickly create a horde of Toads or Frogs (5, 15, 50, 100 ...MORE ?...ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer !) that are following you as if you were their mother !

To obtain these Toads/Frogs eggs, simply bring any “Toad/Frog Egg ” (found with some [color=#00ff00]Merchants in Falkreath [/color]: [i][b]Volga Vinicia of the Dead Man's Drink, Solaf of the Gray Pine Goods, Zaria of the Grave Concoctions[/b][/i]) to a forge and create the "Incubated Toad/Frog Egg" in the "misc" section. Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into Toad or Frog. The Toad or the Frog follow you.

When your creatures die, remember to loot their corpses for more eggs



[b][color=#ff0000][size=4]TOAD or FROG MOUNT[/size][/color][/b]

You must place this .esp at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game to obtain the 3 books...(Normally, this is done automatically)

To have the summonable Toad or Frog you can buy the “Spell tome: XXXX”, at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach (Whiterun) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace in Solitude).

With the books, you have the spells...

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=607042Farengar.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/607042Farengar.jpg[/img][/url]



[color=#ff0000][b][size=4] INSTALLATION [/size][/b][/color]

If you have my other mods with Incubated Eggs: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55592/?]Incubated Eggs[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76681/?]Chimeras Mounts and Armies[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76864/?]New Gryphons Mounts and Armies[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76818/?]Snails and Slugs of Skyrim[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77311/?]Repopulate with Mushrooms[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73785/?]Griffins Mounts and Armies[/url],[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68187/?]Gerbils Mounts and Followers [/url],[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68832/?] Skaven Mounts and Followers [/url]or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55520/?] Incubated Winged Chocobos [/url], in order to find these eggs at Merchants, you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game.

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=132418Solaf.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/132418Solaf.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#00ff00][i] Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

You have to put the folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "

[color=#00ff00][i] For the manual and the NMM installations:[/i][/color]

You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):

[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001

These settings allow you to see all mounts (of my mods) correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not

[color=#ff0000][b][size=5] Bugs or Problems [/size][/b][/color]

[i] [b]For the armies:[/b][/i]

No fast travels!

They tend to be blocked by city doors

When the Toad/Frog is in battle, it approaches the enemy and just stand their and lets itself be attacked and it doesn't fight back (there is no animation in the game for the Toad/Frog/Rabbit to fight)

[i][b] For the mount:[/b][/i]

The Toad/Frog can’t jump or swim…

To turn easily,it is better to walk ! ...

[i] [b]For the companions:[/b][/i]

You can only have one follower at a time: if you want a different one, you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If you have any problem with the dialog box, or if telling the follower to return at home doesn't dismiss him, or if you have lost the active follower, you can try this:

Type “²” or "`" or "~" key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

If problem with the Dialog Box of the followers/ companions (Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss) you can also enter / exit a house or make a fast travel




[color=#ff0000] [size=4] [b]CREDITS [/b][/size][/color]

Merci aux moddeurs dont les noms suivent:

[color=#ff0000]LorSakyamuni [/color] for the Toads in the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76524/?] The Witcher 3 Monsters and Animals Resource Pack [/url] (“You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me”,“Pack containing a lot of monsters and animals included in the game The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt. All the original assets belong to [url=http://en.cdprojektred.com/] CD PROJEKT RED [/url] and are distributed with their permission. Feel free to use them, just remember to credit me.”); these animals are rigged by [color=#ff0000] SpikeDragonLord and jboyd4 [/color] in the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76203/?]Beasts of Tamriel[/url]

New textures for the batrachians by [color=#ff0000]cansu[/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81383/?]Toads and Frogs of Skyrim retexture [/url]

Free sounds: [url=http://www.universal-soundbank.com/]universal-soundbank[/url] - [url=http://soundbible.com/2033-Frogs.html]SoundBible.com[/url] - [url=http://www.naturenorth.com/spring/sound/shfrsnd.html] Frog and Toad Calls - NatureNorth.com[/url] - [url=https://www.umesc.usgs.gov/terrestrial/amphibians/armi/frog_calls.html] ARMI - Frog and Toad Calls[/url]

[color=#ff0000]Kahjiit Raj[/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16831/?] Golden Egg Treasure Hunt [/url] for the texture (with:Wyeko,struckdumb,super_chicken,bigsteve7743,Enchantedgal,WanderingSoul,kuschelirmel,Wisdoms_Pe,ttainted_sharben)
of the Frog Egg ("Asset use permission": "You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me")


You have also a Companion Frog in my mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79738/?]The Abandoned Farm [/url]
author: gg77

files.name: Toads and Frogs of Skyrim 3.1
files.changelogHtml:
3.1: Sounds of ambience for the Frogs and the Toads + More Frogs and Toads in new locations: Lake LLinalta (near Riverwood) - Lake Geir (near Ivarstead) - Lake Honrich (near Riften), also near Markath, Morthal and the South of Solitude (Near the boats on the other shore)

2.0: New Textures for the Toads and the Frogs + Adds Followers Frogs + Mount Frog + Wild Frogs, near and in Riverwood

1.2: Adds Frogs (Army and Wild) + The Wild Toads don't flee

1.1: Resolution of the textures increased

files.name: Toads and Frogs of Skyrim 3.2
files.changelogHtml: Reduced size of the frogs and toads + Less Frogs near Whiterun + "See you later" replace "Go away" + "Water flow" fixed
